File libsrc/libgmethod/QC.c

Public Function Index

new_QC (QCDef *)
Create a QC object.
QC_methodCreate (const char *)
QC_addMethod ()

Public Functions

new_QC 
 QC new_QC(QCDef *qcdef)
Create a QC object. QC is a GMethod object that cuts out parts of a waveform that have been flagged as bad data by a QC operator.

Parameters:
QCDef - input mask definition.
Returns:
a QC object, or NULL if malloc fails (logErrorMsg will be called)
QC_methodCreate 
 GMethod QC_methodCreate(const char *s)
QC_addMethod 
 void QC_addMethod()
Register the QC as a readable GMethod. This routine should be called once before a QC is read from a file.
